means: 专事勾引妇女者，浪荡子

sentence.Network_en: He has a reputation as the office Lothario.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在办公室泡妞乱搞是出了名的。

sentence.Network_en: Who's a self - absorbed, lothario punk who knows nothing about fashion!
sentence.Network_cn: 这小子是个自大的,放荡的小流氓对时尚一无所知!

sentence.Network_en: Dramatic retelling of the life and loves of the eighteenth - century lothario, Casanova.
sentence.Network_cn: 本剧讲述了18世纪著名的风流浪子的生活和爱情故事.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Ugly Betty第一季第1集剧本（中英文） - 豆丁网 ... nepotistic： 偏袒起用亲戚的人 lothario： 色狼,好色之徒 punk： 废物.
lothar 科拉茨, lothario 放荡者, lotharingia 洛陶林吉奥

list.abs: he is a self - absorbed lothario punk ., 他是个刚愎自用的浪荡子.

means.word_mean: 1. a successful womanizer (after a fictional seducer)

auth_sentence.content: The perpetual lothario effortlessly inhabits the midnight ache of Shameless, sharpening his seduction across a slow electro burn.
